alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Chouteau; Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 10:13PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Judith Basin, central Fergus, southern Chouteau and eastern Cascade Counties through 1115 PM MDT... At 1011 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Belt to 10 miles southwest of Geyser to 11 miles south of Hobson. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Fort Benton, Stanford, Belt, Geraldine, Denton, Hobson, Moore, Highwood, Geyser, Carter, Neihart, Windham, Forestgrove, Sapphire Village, Utica, Shonkin, Danvers, Hilger and Buffalo. This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 0 and 109. Highway 191 between mile markers 1 and 26. Highway 87 between mile markers 28 and 52. Highway 89 between mile markers 30 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
